sentences.en: Adding additives can improve properties of urea formaldehyde resin adhesive.
sentences.cn: 添加外加剂可以提高脲醛树脂胶粘剂性能.

sentences.en: Formaldehyde and distillation are the nitrogen determination methods in the sample.
sentences.cn: 甲醛法与蒸馏法是测定样品中氮含量的方法.
甲醛能慢慢使多种病毒失去活性.

sentences.en: Meanwhile TG - DSC show furfural to raise the urea - formaldehyde resin resistance foaming.
sentences.cn: 同时TG -DSC 表明糠醛在一定程度上提高了脲醛树脂的耐热性能.

sentences.en: Methanol dehydrogenation is a promising route for commercial production of anhydrous formaldehyde.
sentences.cn: 甲醇直接脱氢制无水甲醛是具有工业化前景的新工艺.

sentences.en: Objective : To optimize the preparing condition of formaldehyde dip method.
sentences.cn: 目的: 优化甲醛浸渍法制备肠溶软胶囊的制备条件.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the mechanism of formaldehyde ( FA ) inhalation induced lung injury.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨甲醛中毒的肺脏损害机制.

sentences.en: Second - hand contains carbon monoxide, ammonia, formaldehyde a pyrene and nitrosamines.
sentences.cn: 二手烟包含了一氧化碳, 氨, 甲醛,苯和亚硝胺.

sentences.en: Sulfur dioxide and formaldehyde both produce irritation.
sentences.cn: 二氧化硫和甲醛都可产生刺激.

sentences.en: The absorption of modify hide glue on formaldehyde gas was researched.
sentences.cn: 初步探讨了改性皮胶对甲醛废气的吸附性能.

sentences.en: The distribution is the key factor which influences the formaldehyde thickness distribution.
sentences.cn: 分析了气流组织对甲醛浓度分布的影响.

sentences.en: The indoor air formaldehyde pollution has some adverse effects on human health.
sentences.cn: 室内空气甲醛污染严重危害人体健康.

sentences.en: The material is readily prepared by reaction of formaldehyde and hydrazine.
sentences.cn: 这种物质很容易由甲醛和肼反应而得到.

sentences.en: This paper describes intensity property of joined timber with urea - formaldehyde resin.
sentences.cn: 本文描述了脲醛树脂胶指接材的强度性能.

sentences.en: You know, artificial boards are a source of the pollutant formaldehyde.
sentences.cn: 你知道, 人造板材是污染物甲醛的来源之一.

phrases.tran_cn: 脲醛树脂；尿素树脂；脲醛尸

trans.tran_cn: 甲醛，福尔马林，甲醛水溶液
trans.tran_en: a strong-smelling gas that can be mixed with water and used for preserving things such as dead animals to be used in science etc
